rooms.name: Lobby/Entrance Hall
rooms.description: Spacious entrance with Bohemian decor, incorporating natural materials and vibrant colors.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Expansive living area with comfortable seating arrangements, open plan, integrating Bohemian artwork and textiles.
rooms.vastu_alignment: North-West for social interactions and relaxation

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: A semi-open dining space adjoining the living room with a view of the garden, promoting communal eating in line with Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern yet warm kitchen design that includes a breakfast nook. Designed following Vastu guidelines to ensure energy flow.
rooms.vastu_alignment: East for auspicious beginnings of the day

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: A guest suite with en-suite bathroom, incorporating Bohemian elements and a calming ambience.
rooms.vastu_alignment: North-West ensuring calm and balanced energy

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Guest bathroom aligned with Vastu principles for cleanliness and wellness.
rooms.vastu_alignment: South-East to balance the energy in communal areas

openings.name: Main Entrance
openings.description: Large double doors with a glass panel, ensuring ample natural light and ventilation while adhering to Vastu.

openings.name: Balcony
openings.location: East side of the living room
openings.description: A covered balcony providing outdoor relaxation space with Bohemian decor elements.

openings.name: Patio Door
openings.description: Leading to an open patio area that connects with the garden, promoting a seamless flow of nature indoors.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with an attached en-suite bathroom, designed to provide privacy and relaxation.

rooms.name: Ensuite Bathroom
rooms.description: Luxurious ensuite bath area with modern fixtures following Vastu guidelines for health and wellness.
rooms.vastu_alignment: South-East ensuring balance in the master suite

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Cozy bedroom designed with Bohemian textiles and vibrant decor, promoting a creative atmosphere.
rooms.vastu_alignment: North-East for energy flow and personal growth

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: A well-lit room that fosters calmness with Bohemian design elements, perfect for relaxation.
rooms.vastu_alignment: North-West to maintain a restful vibe

rooms.name: Bedroom 4
rooms.description: Additional bedroom that balances the layout of the house, keeping in line with spatial symmetry and Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Family Lounge/Study
rooms.description: A multi-purpose area combining lounge and study, designed to encourage creativity and productivity with Bohemian influences.
rooms.vastu_alignment: East for clarity and focus in the morning

openings.name: Staircase
openings.location: North-East corner of ground floor connecting both levels
openings.description: Open staircase designed for natural light flow, ensuring safety and aesthetics following Vastu guidelines.

openings.name: Balcony
openings.description: A private balcony providing a serene outlook on the West-facing garden space, aligning with Vastu recommendations for relaxation.

rooms.name: Swimming Pool Deck
rooms.description: A spacious swimming pool area with deck and seating, offering a leisurely Bohemian vibe.
rooms.vastu_alignment: West facing to ensure relaxation and cooling effects

openings.name: Pool Deck Entrance
openings.location: South-West corner of the roof terrace
openings.description: Direct access to the pool area, ensuring ease of movement between indoor and outdoor spaces.

openings.name: Sun Deck Access
openings.description: Additional opening providing access to a sun deck area for relaxation under the open sky.
